dcterms:creator: A. Asuncion
D. Newman
dcterms:description: The UCI Adult dataset captures information about 48,842 individuals including their sociodemographics. The aim is to predict if individuals earn more than USD 50k per year, treating gender as the sensitive attribute.
dcterms:title: UCI Adult Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Angwin
J. Larson
S. Mattu
L. Kirchner
dcterms:description: The COMPAS dataset was developed as a decision support tool to score the likelihood of a person's recidivism, containing information about over 10,000 criminal defendants in Broward County, Florida.
dcterms:title: COMPAS Dataset

dcterms:creator: L. F. Wightman
dcterms:description: The Law School dataset contains information about law school admission records and is used to predict whether a candidate passes the bar exam, with gender as the sensitive attribute.
dcterms:title: Law School Dataset

dcterms:description: The synthetic dataset is generated based on certain statistical distributions as described in the methodology section.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset

dcterms:description: The semi-synthetic datasets are derived from the Law School dataset as described in the methodology section.
dcterms:title: Semi-Synthetic Datasets
